P'n'C

A point and click game in which the goal is to solve all available puzzles on the selected level. Each level is a completely separate story and puzzles. There are different types of puzzles in the game. Starting from delivering a specific thing to a specific person by combining and finding different uses for found objects.

I create the game in my free time and it is still in development.

I publish all the news about it on Twitter:
